text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro welcome to another Nerdy
Nummies!

Today we are going to be making something
that has been heavily requested
again, something Star Wars.

And it’s spring time, right now, summer
is right around the corner, so I
thought, why don’t I make lightsaber popsicles?

I found these really cool popsicle sticks
at Think Geek, they’re Star Wars!

Little lightsabers! And here I got the empire
1, and it’s really cool, because

check out this little button in the back.
You push this, and…

It glows red! So our red popsicle will glow
red just like a lightsaber!

And then, if you push this other button….
Ah!

The things you will need, will be: sugar,
kiwis, 6 ounces of raspberries,

lemon juice, lime juice, some measuring cups, water,
a sifter, or a strainer,

whatever you’ve got, popsicle sticks and
a blender.

First we’re gonna make the empire popsicles,
and they’re gonna be

raspberry popsicles because they are red.
So you’re just gonna take your

blender and dump in your 6 ounces of fresh
raspberries, 1/3 cup of water,

1 tablespoon of lemon juice. And if you want
to squeeze fresh lemons thats
fine too. And then 1/3 a cup of sugar.
Then you’re just gonna blend it up.
Oh yeah, oh yeah, oh yeah!

Ta-da! That was super easy, you only need
to blend it for a few seconds,
like 10-20 seconds, very easy!

And now you’e just gonna take your strainer
or sifter and pour all of the

liquid through, so it will catch a lot of
the seeds.

Unless you like seeds in your popsif… pops…
Unless you like seeds…
You didn’t hear that!
OK, I’m just straining it through,

After you’ve made your like raspberry smoothie
juice you’re gonna put it in here.

I like to put it into here because it’s
a little bit easier to pour into
these really narrow containers.

And then you’ll just fill ‘em up to the
top!
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh! A little bit too much!

Now I’ll just use my Jedi powers to make
those go away.
Can I have a paper towel please?

Now you’re gonna take your empire sticks,
put ‘em right on top, boop!

Now we are going to make the rebel alliance
popsicles.

These are going to be green, so we’re making
kiwi popsicles, and the first

thing you’ll want to do is take 1 cup of
water, and put it on the stove to
heat up and bring it to a boil.

And while our water, I just put a cup on the
stove right now. is heating,
we’re gonna cut up our kiwis.
He’s so fuzzy!

And we’re just gonna use a peeler, and I’m
just gonna peel off all of his

skin. Be careful, don’t get your fingers
young Padawans.
I have done that, it’s not fun!

Once you got all of your little kiwis peeled,
you’re just gonna cut ‘em in half,
like so!
And then cut them 1 more time.
Yum, yum, yum, yum, yum! Fresh kiwis!

Now you’re just gonna toss ‘em in the
blender. Bloop! Bloop!
Blend! Bewm!

Now we are gonna go check on our boiling water
and we’re gonna add
some sugar to it.

Once your sugar water syrup is ready, you’re
just gonna pour it into the

blender. Then you are gonna add 1/2 cup of
lime juice. Put it in the blender.

Last but not least, you’re just gonna add
3/4 cup of water, just regular
water, nothing fancy!
Now put the lid on and blend again!

Once it’s all blended. I’m just gonna
take this top off.

And again, I’m just gonna take a strainer
or a sifter, whatever you have,

over a bowl and pour the liquid through. Usually,
if these weren’t

lightsabers, I might leave the little seeds
in, but, I don’t like seeds
in my lightsabers!

Now I’m just gonna take the liquid and pour
it in here.
Rebel alliance time!

Now you’re just gonna take off the popsicle
sticks, fill them up, try

not to, aw! Leak all over your table like
me!
Oops I poured too much again!

Now the final step, just put on these little
sticks. Merp!

Once you’re all done, you’re just gonna
put these in the freezer for about

6 hours, or if you want you can leave them
overnight, whichever you'd like
better, and then they’ll be ready to eat!
Oh hey, ta-da! We did it!

These are so good! I’m enjoying the raspberry
1 right now, but if you want
to see the other ones, let’s pull 1 out.
Ooh, ooh, ooh!
There we go! Awesome! Dee-dee!

Thanks you guys for suggesting it, I love
making these, if you have any

other suggestions for any other Nerdy Nummies,
please let me know,

leave me a comment down below and I will do
my best to make it happen!
OK, thanks you guys, bye-bye!

Berm, berm, ber, bem, bem, bem, bem, bemp!
Bem-Bem-Bem-Bem-Besm-Bee!
Light show, light show!
